#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
try{
    long test,kk=0;
    while(cin>>test)
    {
        kk++;
        cout<<"Case #"<<kk<<": ";
        long sum; cin>>sum;
        int n; cin>>n;
        int arr[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>arr[i];
        int flag=0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++)
            {
                if((arr[i]+arr[j])==sum)
                {
                    flag=1;
                cout<<i+1<<" "<<j+1<<endl;break;
                }
            }
            if(flag==1)
            break;
        }
    }
}
    catch(char* e)
    {;}
    
    return 0;
}
